meanings.definition: A Roman festival celebrated on the 8th day before the Ides of October (October 7th) in honor of Mars.
meanings.english_definition: A Roman festival celebrated on the 8th day before the Ides of October (October 7th) in honor of Mars.

examples.sentence: The Octavaria was an important event in the Roman calendar.
examples.translation: オクタヴァリアはローマ暦において重要なイベントでした。
